  * Option 3 refers to the location of the nuclear area in the binary fission diagram, which is relevant but does not fit into the chronological order of events.
  * Option 1 describes the lysis of the cell and release of the free spore, which comes last in the sequence after all other processes have occurred.

Therefore, the correct order is 2 -> 4 -> 3 -> 1 -> 5.
